content: can you use the continuous join-as-you-go technique on motifs that aren t square yes learn how in this free pattern pattern includes a written pattern for the hexagons in standard us terms and the join path for a 7-hex layout the join path for a larger layout 5 columns of 3 or 4 hexes you can easily enlarge from there a picture tutorial for the join and a link to a video tutorial for the join total yardage for sample 7 hexes 600 yards hexagons 425 yards join 175 yards finished size sample 7 hexes measures 32 from top to bottom each hex measures 9 from flat side to flat side
